name: Garp Sinhala 7.2.0
description:
Garp Sinhala came a long way since garp sinhala 5.0.
and now we released Garp sinhala 7.2.0.
7.2.0 is more faster and stable than the older ver.

basics of the garp sinhala still the same with 5 letter magic
and compatible with windows vista and windows 7

please feel free to visit our website http://www.garpsinhala.com
for further informations and documentations.

download it while it's free
